channel.title: Error Runing Server
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I get this error when i run. I made paths, i think they are right but not sure. Also i've tried using other run.bat. but didn't work.
Sorry for posting so much posts under 'server help'

item.title: Error Runing Server
item.dc:creator: @3d3r 3d3r
item.description:
@3d3r wrote:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

I get this error when i run. I made paths, i think they are right but not sure. Also i’ve tried using other run.bat. but didn’t work.

Sorry for posting so much posts under ‘server help’
